name: E4C: Final Salvation
summary: Welcome to E4C: Final Salvation, a 3v3 Player vs. Player hero battler. Final Salvation belongs to a genre known as the MOBA, standing for Massively Online Battle Arena.

name: E4M1 remake
summary: It's a short map (5-10 minutes) inspired by E4M1. The visuals are kept minimal to stay true to the spirit of the original map.
